name: PAT_RACE_ETHNICITY
description: All values associated with a claim are stored in the Claim External Value record. This table holds the race and ethnicity codes that apply to the claim.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: RACE_ETHNICITY
columns.description: This item holds the race or ethnicity code for the patient.
